mapper.update: update user_score_detail set occur_time = #{occurTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score_id = #{scoreId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, integral_score = #{integralScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, occur_time, user_id, score_id, integral_score, remark from user_score_detail
